text:
We truly notice if my wife’s mom had her drops.. the Alzheimer is significantly milder,
She is happy and makes jokes..  such a relieve. They should start to give all patients some drops regularly. #thc #cbd #cannabis #dementia #mmj #wietolie #CB1 #CB2 #cancer #Alzheimer #copd https://t.co/x5FgdrhlyP
